Scripts.OnShow: UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(self, GrOM.ClassDropdown_Initialize) self:SetScript("OnUpdate", function(self) local x = UIDropDownMenu_GetSelectedValue(self) or GrOM.Localization.any if x:len() > 15 then x = x:sub(1, 13).."..." end _G[self:GetName().."Text"]:SetText(x) self:SetScript("OnUpdate", nil) end)

UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(self, GrOM.SpecDropdown_Initialize) self:SetScript("OnUpdate", function(self) local x = UIDropDownMenu_GetSelectedValue(self) or GrOM.Localization.any if x:len() > 15 then x = x:sub(1, 13).."..." end _G[self:GetName().."Text"]:SetText(x) self:SetScript("OnUpdate", nil) end)

UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(self, GrOM.ClassDropdown_Initialize) self:SetScript("OnUpdate", function(self) local x = UIDropDownMenu_GetSelectedValue(self) or GrOM.Localization.any if x:len() > 15 then x = x:sub(1, 13).."..." end _G[self:GetName().."Text"]:SetText(x) self:SetScript("OnUpdate", nil) end)

UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(self, GrOM.PrefSpecDropdown_Initialize) self:SetScript("OnUpdate", function(self) local x = UIDropDownMenu_GetSelectedValue(self) or "TANK" if x:len() > 15 then x = x:sub(1, 13).."..." end _G[self:GetName().."Text"]:SetText(x) self:SetScript("OnUpdate", nil) end)

UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(self, GrOM.IgnoreSpecDropdown_Initialize) self:SetScript("OnUpdate", function(self) local x = UIDropDownMenu_GetSelectedValue(self) or GrOM.Localization.none if x:len() > 15 then x = x:sub(1, 13).."..." end _G[self:GetName().."Text"]:SetText(x) self:SetScript("OnUpdate", nil) end) self:Hide()

UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(self, GOMaticExtrasDropdown_Initialize) local x, y = GrOM.GetCurrentExtrasPane() UIDropDownMenu_SetSelectedValue(self, x) _G[self:GetName().."Text"]:SetText(y) GrOM.UIFrameFadeIn(self, .3, 0, 1)

UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(self, GrOM.AutoAutoMenu1_Initialize) UIDropDownMenu_SetSelectedValue(self, GrOM.GetCurrentAutoAuto(1)) _G[self:GetName().."Text"]:SetText(select(2,GrOM.GetCurrentAutoAuto(1))) GrOM.UIFrameFadeIn(self, .3, 0, 1) self.t:SetText(tostring(GrOM.raidSize1) .. ":")

UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(self, GrOM.AutoAutoMenu2_Initialize) UIDropDownMenu_SetSelectedValue(self, GrOM.GetCurrentAutoAuto(2)) _G[self:GetName().."Text"]:SetText(select(2,GrOM.GetCurrentAutoAuto(2))) GrOM.UIFrameFadeIn(self, .3, 0, 1) self.t:SetText(tostring(GrOM.raidSize2) .. ":")

UIDropDownMenu_Initialize(self, GrOM.AutoAutoMenu3_Initialize) UIDropDownMenu_SetSelectedValue(self, GrOM.GetCurrentAutoAuto(3)) _G[self:GetName().."Text"]:SetText(select(2,GrOM.GetCurrentAutoAuto(3))) GrOM.UIFrameFadeIn(self, .3, 0, 1) self.t:SetText(tostring(GrOM.raidSize3) .. ":")
GrOM.UIFrameFadeIn(self, .3, 0, 1) local t = _G[self:GetName().."Text"] t:SetJustifyH("LEFT") t:SetWidth(170) GrOM.UIFrameFadeIn(self, .3, 0, 1)

Scripts.OnClick: if self:GetChecked() then GOMaticEZCreatorSeparateOption:SetChecked(not GOMaticEZCreatorSeparateOption:GetChecked()) else self:SetChecked(true) end
if self:GetChecked() then GOMaticEZCreatorMergeOption:SetChecked(not GOMaticEZCreatorMergeOption:GetChecked()) else self:SetChecked(true) end

Scripts.OnMouseUp: if button == "LeftButton" then local x, y = self:GetLeft() - GOMaticAnchorFrame:GetLeft(), self:GetBottom() - GOMaticAnchorFrame:GetBottom() self:StopMovingOrSizing() self:ClearAllPoints() self:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", GOMaticAnchorFrame, "BOTTOMLEFT", x, y) end
